title: Strengthening Leadership Competencies: Iterative Instructional Design Model Workshops for Graduate Students’ Teaching Method Development

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of Teaching Experience or Assistant Teacher Career, Advanced Social Field Educational Knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Participants can develop at least one social lecture module by applying the four stages (Analysis-Design-Development-Evaluation) of the iterative instructional design model.
Participants can clearly link educational objectives with assessment criteria based on learner analysis.
Participants can revise and improve instructional strategies at least twice through peer feedback and real-world lecture simulations.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
